snippet.title: Surgeon Simulator 2: Gamescom Launch Trailer Ft. Doc from Back To The Future
snippet.description:
Buy Surgeon Simulator 2, sequel to the original indie surgery sim from Bossa Studios, on the Epic Games Store: https://bossa.games/3jj8nDN. And to celebrate the launch, check out the Surgeon Sim 2: Gamescom Launch Trailer, featuring very special guest, Doctor Emmett L. Brown from Back to the Future - “great scotts!” (played by Christopher Lloyd)

Released on 27th August 2020, the physics based pandemonium returns with Surgeon Simulator 2. From new operations to solo and 4-way surgery co-op, get ready to explore an entire medical facility of wonder in this *fully* fleshed-out sequel!

Rock Paper Shotgun - “Still funny after seven years - and now there’s an actual game to go with it”
Gamebyte - “You’re going to absolutely fall in love with the upcoming sequel”
PC Gamer - “Surgeon Simulator 2 has evolved into something much more interesting”
GamesRadar - “Expands the formula from a one-person surgery/comedy show to a four player improv medical team

Watch the Gameplay Reveal Trailer here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uD40Fc795wk

Watch the Surgery Gameplay Trailer here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V6COQHqc4LE
